projects.title: Dev Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: Smart Xpress -  Bus App
projects.bodyText:
- A web application to provide the hassle-free experience to public bus users.
 - It includes management for bus transportation, including payment and bus route tracking while travelling.

projects.title: D-DedupX
projects.bodyText:
- D-DedupX is a cloud-based data deduplication system utilizing algorithms to optimize storage efficiency.
 - It identifies and store unique data chunks across multiple uploaded files.

projects.title: Social Safeguard
projects.bodyText:
- A real-time social distancing violation detection system using computer vision and deep learning.
 - Integrated object detection model YOLO with streamlit for user friendly video input and alerts.

projects.title: PrePy - Data Preprocessing Library
projects.bodyText:
- A python library for performing pre-processing data methods.
 - It can be easily imported and ready to use.
 - It includes some methods such as missing data, normalizing data, Finding co-relations, etc.
